alert.note: Alert for Admiralty Island; City and Borough of Juneau; City and Borough of Sitka (Alaska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Watch issued September 22 at 7:18AM AKDT by NWS Juneau
info.description: ...FLOOD WATCH REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 10 AM AKDT THIS MORNING... * WHAT...Flooding caused by excessive rainfall continues to be possible. * WHERE...The following areas, Central Inner Channels and Eastern Gulf Coast. This includes the cities of Gustavus, Hoonah, Tenakee Springs, Elfin Cove, Pelican, Sitka, Angoon, And Juneau. * WHEN...Until 10 AM AKDT this morning. * IMPACTS...Excessive runoff may result in flooding of rivers, creeks, streams, other low-lying areas and flood-prone locations. Creeks and streams may rise out of their banks. Area creeks and streams are running high and could flood with more heavy rain. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - Heavy precipitation continues to be observed in the watch area in satellite imagery, doppler weather radar and surface observations.
info.instruction: You should monitor later forecasts and be alert for possible Flood Warnings. Those living in areas prone to flooding should be prepared to take action should flooding develop. Stay tuned to further developments by listening to your local radio, television, or NOAA Weather Radio for further information.
